name: American Steakhouse Chicken
ingredients: 1/3 cup Da Vinci sugar free syrup, pineapple flavor
Green pepper rings for garnish, optional (not included in the counts)

instructions.en: Combine the soy sauce, syrup, wine and vinegar in a small bowl.
Place the chicken breasts in a gallon zipper bag; pour in the marinade.
Marinate in the refrigerator for 4 hours.
Drain the marinade from the chicken.
Optional: Garnish with green pepper rings.

notes: This recipe makes 4 servings. Can be frozen without the peppers. Green pepper rings for garnish are optional and not included in the nutritional counts.
